content.question: In lines 2-3, Livi nomine gloriaque commotum is translated

choices.label: motivated by Livy’s name and fame
Livy’s name and fame motivated him
motivated Livy by his name and fame
Livy motivated his name and fame

content.answer: motivated by Livy’s name and fame

unit.text: 3: Pliny's Letters: Ghosts and Apparitions, Letters to Trajan and Calpurnia, and Teacher's Choice - Latin Prose
